question: You see a colorful machine at home that you have never used before. What do you want to do first?

options.text: Press buttons to see what each one does
Think about what it could be used for in daily life
Check if it is safe to touch and use

options.text: How the plant grows there without help
Whether it needs water or care to stay healthy
